= EX 5 =
00	LOAD 20
01	DIVI 21
02	STOR 20
03	TST0
04	JUMP 00
05	STOP
20	     20
21	     03

Do-while, divide 20 by 3 untill 0. Integer so round makes it true after 3 itterations.
